transcript: Asma from Bangladesh Assalamu Alaikum Assalamu Alaikum It is said that to make wish we have to first praise to Allah then say salutation to Muhammad Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam. So how can we do this inside of the prayer as or like after the prayer we can do a voluntary sujood and then do this? Okay first of all this is when you're making general dua. So I'm sitting now and I want to make general dua. I raise my hands Allahumma lakal hamd, hamdul katheem, tayyib mubarak fee, Allahumma sallallahu wa sallam ala Muhammad and I make my dua. In salat you don't do this. So in your sujood you just go ahead oh Allah give me this, oh Allah protect me from that or cure my ill without need of praising Allah or offering salutation in the prayer because this was not prescribed and Allah azza wa jal knows best this is
